titles.title: A bill for the relief of Patricia Newman.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 6/10/1988--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to a named individual a specified sum in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States for benefits or compensation arising from the death of her husband.
